name: Test of Metal

dialogue.offer: This'll see if you've got the stuff for me. Take this axe, and go chop me 15 logs. You've got three days to do it.
dialogue.rejected: Guess you don't got the stuff, eh?
dialogue.success: Good job. Welcome to the team. I'll need my ax back, by the way.
dialogue.failure: I guess you couldn't do it. Better luck next time.

name: Slime roadkill
description: Go splatter some slimes that've been causing trouble on one of the roads, and bring back enough slime to prove you did it.

dialogue.offer: There are some slimes that have been troubling people on one of the roads, and the townspeople are concered for their safety. I want you to go kill them.
dialogue.advice: While they can be cut, it is generally better to splatter them with something large and heavy.
dialogue.accepted: Great! I'll be here when you return.
dialogue.rejected: Someone's going to do it anyway.
dialogue.success: Nice. I'll just take those off your hands, they're good for greasing the hinges around here.
dialogue.success_lie: You don't look nearly as sticky as you're supposed to. Get back to it.
dialogue.failure: Did they give you the slip? Can't imagine the situation being sticky enough to give you that much trouble.

name: Goblin slaying
description: Go kill some goblins that've been causing trouble and bring back their ears as proof of the deed.

dialogue.offer: Some goblins have become a troublesome bunch. They've been raiding the farms and the farmers can't afford any more sheep getting stolen. This bag of 30 silver is up for grabs to anyone that can deal with the problem and prove they've done it.
dialogue.advice: A spear is usually good to deal with them. Watch out for their group tactics.
dialogue.accepted: Good. They'll be happy to hear someone's out on the hunt.
dialogue.rejected: Someone has to do it, if you don't want to.
dialogue.success: Good. I'll present these to the farmers as proof and then they can burn them or whatever.
dialogue.success_lie: You don't smell like you've been near them. Hop to it.
dialogue.failure: I guess I'll just pass it off to this guy in armour then.
